definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: Bezier Line in the Scene View.
sentences.chinese: 在场景视图的贝塞尔曲线。

sentences.english: Yet, some outcomes must be different between the two scenarios. Chen et al.
sentences.chinese: 但在这两种场景中，一定有一些结果是不同的。

sentences.english: Implementing customer scenarios to include the flow of defect submissions expands integration coverage.
sentences.chinese: 包含缺陷交付流程的实施客户场景扩展了集成的范围。

sentences.english: Scenes from the 17th century landscape paintings were replicated as Arcadian scenes.
sentences.chinese: 场景从17世纪景观作为田园场景复制画。

sentences.english: Scenes from the 17th century landscape paintings were replicated as Arcadian scenes.
sentences.chinese: 场景从17世纪景观作为田园场景复制画。

sentences.english: But the scene is actually an optical illusion.
sentences.chinese: 而事实上，这样的场景只是一种光学错觉。

sentences.english: I'm not in the scene , I think I'm fallin' asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我不在场景中，我认为我睡着了。

sentences.english: These scenes where the characters actually are running for their lives are terrifying.
sentences.chinese: 这些角色正在为他们的生命奔跑的场景实在可怕。

sentences.english: The novel is set in Edinburgh and the Lothians at the time of the Napoleonic Wars.
sentences.chinese: 小说的场景设置在爱丁堡和拿破仑战争时期的锡兰。

sentences.english: He has struck off a good description of the scene.
sentences.chinese: 他已把该场景清晰流畅地描述出来了。

sentences.english: If nothing else though, it gave us the honey scene.
sentences.chinese: 尽管其他一无是处，但它给我们带来了甜蜜的场景。

sentences.english: WOA enables SOA practitioners to explore a different set of business scenarios.
sentences.chinese: WOA支持SOA实践者去探索不同的业务场景集合。

sentences.english: He says if you could stand on the Moon and watch the total lunar eclipse, the view would be even more dramatic.
sentences.chinese: 如果能在月亮上看月全食，场景会更令人惊奇。

sentences.english: An homage to the Mufasa death scene?
sentences.chinese: 向穆法沙的死亡场景致敬？

sentences.english: In typical ingestion scenarios, you will have a number of data sources to process.
sentences.chinese: 在典型的摄入场景中，您会有大量的数据源要处理。

sentences.english: At the moment, only the polygons pointed towards the light source will be lit.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的场景里，只有朝向光源的多边形是被照亮的。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
real scene (not set up or posed)/real location (not a film studio set or theater)/live action (not animation)
camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
(idiom) to experience it for oneself/to actually *be* there (as opposed to reading about it etc)
the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh
